title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must identify the party that won the highest percentage of votes and seats in 1982.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a change between the percentage of seats won by Republicans in 1982 and 2012.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about the difference in percentage of votes won and seats won in Ohio in the 2012 election as shown in the charts.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain why the information in the charts could pose a challenge to participatory democracy.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
